name: Topics in Modern/Art/Architecture
description: An in-depth examination of a topic in modern art and/or architecture. Topics vary from year to year, and the content in any given year depends upon the instructor. A seminar course limited to 20 students. [24S]
prerequisites: FAH101H5/FAH105H5/FAH202H5, FAH287H5/FAH288H5 and at least 1.0 in FAH/VCC at the 300/400 level, or P.I.
